data.name: RealityCapture Demo
data.detailed_description:
RealityCapture (also known as RC) creates accurate 3D models out of unordered set of photographs seamlessly and very fast. The software is a Windows (7/8/10+) x64 application with a nice, intuitive, and friendly user interface.
RealityCapture is a unique piece of software that pushes the envelope of what can be done with the photogrammetric methods. The software innovation and uniqueness lies mostly in its low-demanding hardware requirements, further, output models are more accurate and complete, and, finally, it is fast. Major competitive excellence: if you double inputs, the processing time will be doubled as well, but any other software will usually increase it fourfold.

What Is Inside?
  • Automatic 3D model creation from your photographs
  • Automatic alignment/registration/calibration of images
  • Advanced coloring and texturing algorithms
  • ( just in paid version ) 3D model export into standard formats (fbx, ply, obj, xyz)
  • A set of tools for analyzing alignment quality and accuracy, mesh reconstruction, 3D model post-processing (filtration, simplification, smoothing), etc.
  • No limits on model size! Unlimited size models in unlimited detail. Even billions of triangles on a computer with 16GB of memory
  • And much more…

Demo version limitations
  • Export restrictions
  • Scenes created in RealityCapture demo cannot be loaded in paid instances of RealityCapture

data.short_description: Create your 3D model for VR automatically from images in few minutes on computer you already have. Colorize, texture, filter, simplify, smooth, export, import, inspect, analyze and much more - all in one software!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Supporting SSE 4.2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA card with 1GB VRAM and CUDA 2.0+
  • Additional Notes: For more information https://www.capturingreality.com/hardware-requirements
